# label

**Instance Property**

A view that provides the optional label of the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ControlGroup].

## Declaration

```swift
let label: ControlGroupStyleConfiguration.Label
```

## Configuring the label

- **ControlGroupStyleConfiguration.Label**: A type-erased label of a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ControlGroup].
